ol.title: To rename a file:

li.p: In the File Management menu group, click File List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: If the file you want to rename appears in the Directory Contents column, continue with the next step. If the file you want to rename does not appear in the Directory Contents column, click the name of the directory that contains the file you want to rename. The contents of that directory appear.

li.p: In the Actions column, click Rename for the file you want. The Rename window appears.
Note: The Control Panel may not allow you to rename files with certain special characters such as “/”.

ol.li: Type the new file name you want in the New Name field and click OK. The home page appears with a message informing you that the file was successfully renamed.
